body_html: It's much easier to quickly reproduce these issues if I have a self-contained example without having to define variables. Perhaps the issue only occurs for certain values of x1_offset, for example. So can you please add a complete example?

body: It's much easier to quickly reproduce these issues if I have a self-contained example without having to define variables. Perhaps the issue only occurs for certain values of `x1_offset`, for example. So can you please add a complete example?
